April 09, 2008

Jott - a voice-based blog client!

Well, this is a first post to my blog using Jott, which is a very cool service. It allows you to call a number and talk what you want to post, and post it to your blog. I think it's one of the new tools that really enable blogging. I'm just going to try it and see how it works out. listen
